name: Marek Eliáš
content: Marek EliÃ¡Å¡ Personal webpage of Marek EliÃ¡Å¡ I am an assistant professor at Bocconi University in Milan. See the webpage of our theory group. Before, I was a postdoc at CWI and EPFL. I did my PhD student at TU Eindhoven, my advisor was Nikhil Bansal. Until 2014, I studied at Charles University in Prague and my advisor was JiÅÃ­ MatouÅ¡ek. Contact email: eisba30. office number: 2-C1-06 address: Department of Computing Sciences Via Roentgen 1 20136 Milano Information for Bocconi students Theses and projects Research interests Theory of algorithms, especially Online Algorithms and ML-augmented Algorithms. My papers Learning-augmented algorithms for MTS with bandit access to multiple predictors with Matei Gabriel Cosa ICML 2025. ArXiv, proceedings, talk by Matei Approximation Algorithms for Combinatorial Optimization with Predictions with Antonios Antoniadis, Adam Polak, and Moritz Venzin ICLR 2025 (spotlight).
